property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Hunters. ■ While battling a light creature, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, untap this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have both the Dragon and Hunter races gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-05 Rising Dash Deck: Infinite Attack!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, count the number of your Hunters in the battle zone. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than that number.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-05 Rising Dash Deck: Infinite Attack!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-05 Rising Dash Deck: Infinite Attack!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-05 Rising Dash Deck: Infinite Attack!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever your Hunters attack, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".
